trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronization context for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un contesto di sincronizzazione per [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not specified at the creation of the DispatcherSynchronizationContext instance, the current <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with the DispatcherSynchronizationContext.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>non viene specificato al momento della creazione dell'istanza, DispatcherSynchronizationContext corrente <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>è associato il DispatcherSynchronizationContext.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo di testo XAML

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref> class by using the current <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'istanza corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> to associate this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref> with.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> associarla <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref> con.

trans-unit.source: dispatcher is .
trans-unit.target: dispatcheris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> to associate this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref> with.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> associarla <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref> con.

trans-unit.source: The priority used to send and post callback methods.
trans-unit.target: La priorità è utilizzata per inviare e registrare i metodi di callback.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherSynchronizationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The copy of this synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: La copia di questo contesto di sincronizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Richiama il callback nel contesto di sincronizzazione in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato viene inserito nella coda del dispatcher a priorità <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>

trans-unit.source: Post starts an asynchronous request to post a message.
trans-unit.target: Post avvia una richiesta asincrona per inviare un messaggio.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Delegato da chiamare.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Richiama il callback nel contesto di sincronizzazione in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: The delegate is put in the dispatcher queue at a priority of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato viene inserito nella coda del dispatcher a priorità <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to call.
trans-unit.target: Delegato da chiamare.

trans-unit.source: The object passed to the delegate.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto passato al delegato.

trans-unit.source: d is .
trans-unit.target: dis .

trans-unit.source: Waits for any or all the elements in the specified array to receive a signal.
trans-unit.target: Attende che uno o tutti gli elementi nella matrice specificata ricevano un segnale.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the native operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: Matrice che contiene l'handle nativo del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to wait for all handles; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to wait for any handle.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per attendere tutti gli handle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per attendere un handle qualsiasi.

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait, or <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> (-1) to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di millisecondi di attesa o <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>(-1) per un'attesa indefinita.</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object that satisfied the wait.
trans-unit.target: Indice della matrice dell'oggetto che ha soddisfatto l'attesa.
